DOC.brief_summary: This post-marketing surveillance study is designed to collect safety information such as post-vaccination adverse events and adverse reactions from recipients of Arepanrix® (H1N1) Intramuscular Injection. The following items will be investigated as priority investigation items. <Priority investigation items> 1. Allergic reactions 2. Anaphylaxis
DOC.criteria: Subjects who receive Arepanrix® intramuscular injection for the first time
